蛦字的基本解释

蛦
yí
〔??（
b?）蛦〕山鸡。

蛦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yí］
［《廣韻》以脂切，平脂，以。］
(1)见“螆蛦”。
(2)见“蛦”。
(3)见“螗蛦”。

蛦字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蛦； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1082第18
【唐韻】以脂切【集韻】延知切，?音夷。螗蛦。附見蜩蝘註。　又?蛦。【左思·蜀都賦】?蛦山棲。【註】?蛦，鳥名也，如今之山雞。　又田黎切，音題。義同。

蛦字的源字形

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
蛦字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yí］
["Guangyun" cut with fat, flat fat, with. ]
(1) See "Shingu".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蛦; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1082 Page 18
[Tang Yun] Cut with fat [Ji Yun] Extend knowledge and cut,? Yin Yi. Scorpion. Attached to the note of the centipede.　 Again? [Zuo Si·Shu Du Fu]? The mountain habitat. [Note]? 蛦, the name of the bird, now the pheasant.　Mata Liqie, phonetic title. The same meaning.
